DataElement.preferredName: Patient Referral Edmonton Frail Scale Result Specify Other Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe other referral made to patient based on the results of the Edmonton Frail Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Referral Edmonton Frail Scale Observation Result Specify
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services._An assessment tool designed to be used by clinicians to assess the frailty of older patients. It assesses 10 domains including cognitive impairment and balance and mobility._An outcome of observation represented as a text, qualitative, or quantitative parameter, code, image, graph, etc._Be specific about something; define clearly.
